long_description: Keep your sense of style when you're on the go in the Lole Marina Dress. Wrinkle-resistant fabric looks and feels fresh even after a red-eye flight or long days of exploring a new city. Stretch nylon fabric resists wrinkling and features 4-way stretch so you can move freely; nylon/elastane "2nd skin" on back of the bodice is moisture-wicking and quick-drying. Built-in UPF 50+ sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Lole Marina Dress features hand pockets, 2 chest pockets and 1 rear welt pocket for plenty of storage; drawcord waistband creates a feminine silhouette.
short_description: Keep your sense of style when you're on the go in the Lole Marina Dress. Wrinkle-resistant fabric looks and feels fresh even after a red-eye flight or long days of exploring a new city.
